page.title: 12Queen's Visit to Winster
page.content: On Friday 15th March 1985, the Queen passed through Winster.For the occasion the Parish Council gave us all some sweets.We were all given a Union Jack to wave at her and I brought my camera because I wanted to take a picture of her.The Queen was going to Ashbourne to visit a Thorntons chocolate factory.She got an Easter Egg for each of her grandchildren.Mandy,Lee and Kerry went to see the Queen at Darley Dale with Cubs and Brownies.The Queen got off the Royal Train at Matlock Station. To commemorte the occasion the Parish Council let Mr.Edwards choose a gift for the school.He chose some binoculars.Elton school came down to Winster to see the Queen too.The Queen had a police escort to protect her.
